msg: Added news of a RAT release (last year.)
Initial committers that we determine to still be
active within the project. These are the people that
will be proposed to go forward when RAT graduates.
Emeritus committers are thosr committers that were
involved in RAT in the early days, most even before
RAT came to the ASF. All are now not active.
